name: TUNNEL DIVERS
detailed_description:
Welcome to your new line of work, pilot.

TUNNEL DIVERS is an online free to play action game featuring futuristic space fighters that are specialized in destroying hordes of robots in enclosed spaces. With plenty of ships and weapons, claustrophobia won't be the most dangerous thing in the tunnels.


TUNNEL DIVERS is free to play and has no pay-to-win attached. Play online with your friends and against other pilots without feeling disadvantaged because you didn't pay for any DLC. The only one who should be paying are the suits from TAC-CORP!


As a twin stick shooter, you need to keep your ship on the move while combating hordes of robots or enemy players. Each ship has its own set of weapons and a unique ability to compliment them.

Play cooperatively with your friends in missions, run the flag in Capture the Flag or just slaughter your enemies in Dogfight mode. TUNNEL DIVERS features many game modes, with more on the way.

Use each ship's unique modules and weapons to outsmart your enemies in intricate online combat.


Vaporize your enemies with powerful weaponry, from long range laser guns to destructive miniature nuclear bombs.

Jump into the cockpit of 7 different ships. Each ship has its own weapons, missiles and special abilities. Lay waste to your enemies with the Rhino, or sneak around them with the Chameleon.


Single player campaign not yet available. Your main task is to destroy the super-computer on each mission. Fight through hordes of hostile robot drones and find it deep within the TAC-CORP facility.

Once you do that, the soothing yet sinister rogue AI, Watch Dog, will only give you a mere 60 seconds to escape with your life before demolishing the facility in a hot white flash.


Play missions and competitive levels designed by pilots all around the world. With painless map sharing, you can join a server without worrying if you have the correct files on your computer or not, as the game can automatically pull level files from the Workshop or the server host itself.


Create compelling levels and share them with the world. Create puzzles, traps, and cinematic effects thanks to the logic gate system, and upload your levels onto the Workshop to get feedback and become a legendary level designer.

The level editor must be purchased via DLC.


From coloring your windshield, to picking out what sort of afterburner exhaust you want, you can aesthetically design each ship to make them yours. Show off to your friends how well you know color theory.

Ship customization must be purchased via DLC.


Enjoy the musical talent of Gergely Kovács, who composed a full soundtrack for the game. If you like the music, please consider buying the game's soundtrack from him, a link will be available in the game's main menu!

short_description: Dive, destroy and escape. TUNNEL DIVERS is a F2P high octane twin stick shooter, where you pilot a close quarters based spaceship that excels in claustrophobic areas. Play online with or against other pilots, create your own levels in the level editor, and wage war against the rogue AI, Watch Dog.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Portforwarding experience requried to host your own server.
